name: BERLIN 2035
description:
‚BERLIN 2035’ is an isometric Agent Deduction Game set in future Berlin. As an agent, you will speak to people and find relevant information.

It is our vision of a future Berlin. It combines clue-finding with deduction and exploration including fitting level design & narrative design. In ‚BERLIN 2035’, you play as an agent and have to solve cases by finding enough evidence to complete the case at the end of the level.
